ISSUE.TITLE: how to deploy without systemd
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: hi, my computer doesn't has systemd and it uses init , can stf deploy on my computer? and my computer only has one port for public net and the port is 80, how can i deploy stf on my computer and visit it from the public net? thank you for this wonderful project , it helps me a lot
